Control Name: 2.2.3 Implement additional security features for any required services, protocols, or daemons that are considered to be insecure.
Control Family: Build and Maintain a Secure Network and Systems

control_attributes.Goals: Build and Maintain a Secure Network and Systems
control_attributes.Control: 2.2.3 Implement additional security features for any required services, protocols, or daemons that are considered to be insecure.
control_attributes.Requirement: 2. Do not use vendor-supplied defaults for system passwords and other security parameters
